schema.description: Sends a token to another contract

msg.description:
Binary is a wrapper around Vec<u8> to add base64 de/serialization with serde. It also adds some helper methods to help encode inline.

This is only needed as serde-json-{core,wasm} has a horrible encoding for Vec<u8>. See also <https://github.com/CosmWasm/cosmwasm/blob/main/docs/MESSAGE_TYPES.md>.
msg.title: Msg

schema.title: Send nft

alerts.text: Only available to the token owner/operator/approved address.

ui:options.title: Recipient Address
ui:options.description: The address of the receiving contract.

ui:options.title: Supporting Message
ui:options.description: Please enter a relevant message to accompany the ID of the token being sent. This can be a description of the auction and/or token.

ui:options.title: Token/NFT Name
ui:options.description: The id of the token to be sent.
